name: emotion Media Center
short_description:
emotion Media Center is a free open source platform independent multimedia application running on top of a multimedia system like a HTPC.

You can use it to watch television, play movies, listen to music, manage your media content and many more.

It is based on a module orientied design which provides a flexible and customizable way to fit anyone's requirements and to support a wide variety of features and applications.
summary: A free open source platform independent multimedia application.
